ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] FW: Hans selling account???...Not yet
ygData.msgSnippet: aiya when eq expansion come out i confirm dunwana buy one lah. that time also cannot play with u all liao. anyways i am lookin forward for a new mrpg to come
ygData.messageBody:
aiya when eq expansion come out i confirm dunwana buy one lah. that time
also cannot play with u all liao. anyways i am lookin forward for a new mrpg
to come out to occupy me so got new game i sure play new game one lah. hehe
anyways i dunno how to sell also. btw FF also quit rite? he sell or let
account lapse?

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <kw.lee@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 28, 2000 11:24 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] FW: Hans selling account???


> Hey Massiah,
>
> Dun quit lah. Keep the account lor. On and off login and play with us.
> Better than quit and later kena attracted to another massive online RPG,
u
> know the effect - countless sleepless nights, no day no night no life etc.
> At least after playing so long in EQ, kinda immune to the temptation of
> PLing. Keep ya acct la. If grow tired of mage then make a new char like
> me lor. Play play other char, or even other sex ;) I now playing a mage,
> maybe u can make a wiz lor, we team like the good old days, hehe. I
still
> waiting for ya pet to help my twink get jboot ah ;P
>
> One thing I like abt EQ is tat I can totally forget abt it when I dun feel
> like playing it. Unlike UO, I gotta login 1-2 times per week to refresh
> houses ;( I also thinking of further study next yr, so very hesitated to
> pick up new games (if u join the SG-Online-RPGers mailing list, u know
> there are few very solid massive RPG coming up). If I stick with EQ
and/or
> UO accts, at least the monthly payment will prevent me from forking our
> more money to play new games, u know lah, married man, gotta think abt
> family budget, hehe (unless u pple all quit UO/EQ then I will also go
> over).
>
> Btw Bibi and Zan, still playing D2? Lesh is also taking exam soon.
> Hopefully I can get lvl 51 by the time he come back and we can get 52
> together. After tat, we will slow down our pace and spend more time with
> guild pple. Expect more taxi in near future ;)
>
> Zil
>
>
>
>
> Singapore Everquest Players List
>
